articles.title: Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders raises FY24 revenue growth guidance, says order book will last 4-5 years - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The company's order book has been on a declining trend over the last five years, starting from over Rs 55,000 crore in financial year 2019 to Rs 39,000 crore currently.
